content.rendered:
Diving. Customized.

Tired of crowded dive boats?
Dive the way you want in Cozumel, MX
Small Groups - Private Boats - Professional Service

Book My Dives

Customized Diving

Dive the way you want, the time you want, the profile you want. Your experience, safety and comfort are important to us. Explore Cozumel with 60 Feet Under.

Guided Experiences

Our knowledgeable guides will take you on an elite experience through Cozumel's finest sites. Avoid traffic and enjoy your dives to the fullest extent possible.

Dive Training

First timer to old timer? Learn to dive or expand your knowledge. All courses, up to a divemaster level, are taught by experienced Padi instructors.

Island Support

Ask 60 Feet Under for help with finding the right accommodation, organizing scooter/car rentals, airport transfers or other activities on the island.

60 Feet Under

Popular Diving Packages

View Diving Packages

Half Day of Diving

- 2 tanks
- Morning or afternoon boat dives
- Private Guide

Starting at $120.00

Full Day of Diving

- 4 tanks
- Boat dives in the morning and afternoon
- Private Guide

Starting at $230.00

AOW - Nitrox

- Advanced training to gain the knowledge, comfort and technique to experience more challenging dive sites with the benefits of Enriched Air.
- 3 Days

Starting at $650

2 Tanks + Night

- Enjoy a 2 tank boat dive in the morning and extent your experience to explore the wonders of diving at night.

Starting at $195.00

60 Feet Under can create a customized diving package with all the options you want! Contact us to learn more!

our professional

Training Courses

From a beginner with no experience to specialized training 😎

OPEN WATER DIVER

Learn to dive and obtain a PADI lifetime license that lets you dive anywhere in the world.

ADVANCED OPEN WATER

Expand your knowledge and ability to feel comfortable in various environments.

SPECIALTY TRAINING

Gain experience with extended knowledge and specialized training to improve your skillset.

View All Courses

a few words

About Us

60 Feet Under is a Scuba Diving Operation created to offer customized diving experiences to clients all stages of their underwater journey: entry to scuba, private courses from beginner level to divemaster and guided dives for certified divers either with a private guide or in groups of your choice.
Read More

our clients love us

Latest Reviews

“I highly recommend reserving your dives with 60 feet under. Agata and Chris give you an excellent diving experience will smaller groups than the other dive companies as well as more flexibility to fit your scheduled. They certified me for open water and were completely professional and accommodating. Agata made absolutely sure that I knew the online course well in addition to all safety protocols prior to any dives. And the dives were super fun! I look forward to diving with them again soon. “

 5/5

Lenny
Open Water Student, Nov 2021

“I just spent 3 amazing days diving with Agata and Chris. I contacted them with the dates my friend and I wanted to dive, what gear we needed, and they took care of the rest. Communication was always done quickly with any questions we had. The prices are so affordable! It was high diving season, and I can’t tell you how lucky we were to have our own boat, no cattle diving for us! We were able to choose our pickup times and what dive sites we wanted to go to which was so nice missing everyone else. During our rest stops, they provided snacks and drinks. The boat caption and deck hand went above and beyond to help us with all of our gear. Agata and Chris are such great people who actually care about the people they dive with. They are attentive when you need it and know all the dive sites in Cozumel well, which will give you the best dives! If you’re looking for a fun, professional, personable and in my opinion, the best dive masters/instructors in Cozumel, then 60ft under is your number one choice.”

 5/5

Marly
Fun Diver, Nov 2021

” For those that like to skip the articles and get the facts, 5 of 5 stars If you’re looking for personalized service, this is definitely the shop for you. Agata Firczyk 60 FEET UNDER was our private guide and offered a personalized service for the 2 of us, they can do small groups and up with a personal touch, flexible and great service!!!
My friend had recently used the dive guide to get her open water this year and when we came back to Cozumel for a quick trip, my friend booked a private trip with 60FT UNDER dive operation. We were able to plan our dive trips each day; what time we left, the dive site and they even asked us what fruit we wanted for the next day. The boat picked us up at our resort and Agata went over the safety discussions/instruction and plan at each site. We never felt rushed to get our gear on or jump in the water. She went over the buddy check each time. Under the water she was very attentive to our diving and she would also point at the critters and let us look at them. On the surface she would offer advice on our diving if needed or make corrections as needed. “

 5/5

Brandy
Fun Diver, Nov 2021

” Always awesome dives with 60 Feet Under. If you want to spend your dives enjoying the little things, book with these guys! “

 5/5

Sean
Fun Diver,
Dec 2021

60 Feet Under Adventure

Partners

Next
